::: { #tab-content-3 .tab-pane }

```{=html}
<table id="quarto-controls" class="table quarto-controls table-borderless p-2">
  <thead style="display: none;">
    <tr>
      <td>Button</td>
      <td>About</td>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <button type="button" class="disabled btn btn-outline-info">
          <i class="bi bi-hammer"></i>
          Render One
        </button>
      </td>
      <td>
          Render a particular document.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <button type="button" class="disabled btn btn-outline-info">
          <i class="bi bi-hammer"></i>
          Render All
        </button>
      </td>
      <td>
          Rerender All Documents. Probably very slow and might delete this
          page if fails.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <button id="quarto-controls-clear-logs" type="button" class="btn btn-outline-danger">
          <i class="bi bi-trash"></i>
          Clear Logs
        </button>
      </td>
      <td>
        Clear all historic log data. Does not clear data for the current session.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <button id="quarto-controls-clear-renders" type="button" class="btn btn-outline-danger">
          <i class="bi bi-trash"></i>
          Clear Renders
        </button>
      </td>
      <td>
        Clear all historic quarto render data. Does not clear data for the current session.
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <button id="quarto-controls-clear-renders" type="button" class="btn btn-outline-danger">
          <i class="bi bi-body-text"></i>
          Status
        </button>
      </td>
      <td>
          Get a status report for the current render.
      </td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
```

```{=html}
<code class="hidden terminal" id="quarto-controls-response">
</code>
```

::::

```{=html}
<script type="module">
  const overlay = Overlay(document.getElementById("quarto-overlay"))
  globalThis.overlay = overlay

  hydrateLiveLog()
  hydrateLiveLogQuarto(overlay)

  const quartoContent = document.getElementById("quarto-content")
  quartoContent.classList.remove("page-columns")

  hydrateClearLogs()
  hydrateClearRenders()
</script>
```
